title: "Table 2 fpscfsa"
output: html_notebook

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

library(readr)
fpscfsat2 <- read_csv("fpscfsat2.csv")



fpscfsat2_flip <- as.data.frame(t(fpscfsat2))


fpscfsat2_flip <-fpscfsat2_flip%>%
  select('V32', 'V33', 'V34', 'V35','V36','V37','V38','V39','V40')

fpscfsat2_flip <-fpscfsat2_flip[ c(2,3,5), ]
  

View(fpscfsat2_flip)
```

```{r}

NonResidentialDrugAbuseProgram<-fpscfsat2_flip[3, 2:3]
NonResidentialDrugAbuseProgram <- NonResidentialDrugAbuseProgram %>%
  rename(Volunteered = V33,Participated = V34)

View(NonResidentialDrugAbuseProgram)


```

```{r}
	
ResidentialDrugAbuseProgram<- fpscfsat2_flip[3, 5:6]
ResidentialDrugAbuseProgram <- ResidentialDrugAbuseProgram %>%
  rename(Volunteered = V36,Participated = V37)
View(ResidentialDrugAbuseProgram)
```


```{r}
ChallengeProgram<-fpscfsat2_flip[3, 8:9] 
ChallengeProgram <- ChallengeProgram %>%
  rename(Volunteered = V39,Participated = V40)
View(ChallengeProgram)

```
